rules_text:
When Zareen, the Second Shah enters, search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less or a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Monument {2}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Each creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Each planeswalker you control enters with an additional loyalty counter on it.
